abstract: nevada routs southern illinois in las vegas classic .
article: las vegas -- caleb martin came off the bench to score 19 points and he added six rebounds , four assists and a couple of steals as nevada romped to an 86-64 victory over southern illinois on friday in the opening round of the las vegas classic . jordan caroline added 13 points and seven rebounds , kendall stephens had 11 points and reserve elijah foster scored 10 for the wolf pack . sean lloyd jr. . topped the salukis with 12 points , rudy stradnieks and kavion pippen added 11 points apiece and aaron cook scored 10 . after tyler smithpeters hit three free throws to give the salukis a 17-16 lead midway through the first half , caleb martin buried three 3-pointers in a 13-0 run to put nevada on top 29-17 .

rudy stradnieks ' layup ended the run , but nevada promptly answered with another 12-0 spurt to push its lead to 41-19 and coasted from there . nevada dominated the boards 41-23 and shot 57 percent from the floor and 58 percent from beyond the arc . southern illinois , which saw a three-game win streak end , connected on just 22 of 57 from the floor and made just 4 of 17 from long range .
